title: FS: T210 Revelle, T202 Evers-Chance, T200 Philly (all sold)
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: T210 Revelle, T202 Evers-Chance, T200 Philly (all sold)
posts.post_content:
Prices are net to me and include shipping.

All three have nice fronts but some issues on the backs as noted.

T210 Revelle175 (SOLD)
T202 Evers - Chance (tape on back)75 (SOLD)
T200 Fatima Philly (tear that looks like someone put a tiny bit of glue on the back)75 (SOLD)

I’ll take the T200 and the T202 please. Pm sent. 

John
